dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S505 IS: ‘Protect Small Businesses from Excessive Paperwork Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Scott of South Carolina (for himself, Mr. Rounds, Mr. Moran, Mr. Hagerty, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Lankford, Mr. Cramer, Ms. Lummis, Mrs. Britt, Mr. Tillis, and Mr. Banks) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to modify the deadline for filing beneficial ownership information reports for reporting companies formed or registered before January 1, 2024.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the ‘Protect Small Businesses from Excessive Paperwork Act of 2025.

section.header: Modification of filing deadline for certain pre-existing reporting companies
section.text: Section 5336(b)(1)(B) of title 31, United States Code, is amended by striking before the effective date and all that follows through under this subsection and inserting before January 1, 2024, shall, not later than January 1, 2026.
